languages.text: {n}Каллигос улыбается хищно и весело.{/n} "Это я должен тебя благодарить. Я был практически уверен, что ты используешь мои затруднения на Футфоле, чтобы прижать к ногтю хитрого слизняка Владайма и взять станцию под свой контроль. Это было бы вполне в духе Вольного Торговца. Но ты оказал{mf|ся|ась} куда менее предсказуем{mf||а}!"

{n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "I should be thanking you. I was almost certain that you would use my difficulties on Footfall as a means to bring that devious weasel Vladaym to heel and take the station for your own. It's what any Rogue Trader would have done. But you have proved yourself to be less predictable than that!"
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос улыбается хищно и весело.{/n} "Это я должен тебя благодарить. Я был практически уверен, что ты используешь мои затруднения на Футфоле, чтобы прижать к ногтю хитрого слизняка Владайма и взять станцию под свой контроль. Это было бы вполне в духе Вольного Торговца. Но ты оказал{mf|ся|ась} куда менее предсказуем{mf||а}!"

I was almost certain that you would use my difficulties on Footfall as a means to bring that devious weasel Vladaym to heel and take the station for your own. It's what any Rogue Trader would have done. But you have proved yourself to be less predictable than that!"

I was almost certain that you would use my difficulties on Footfall as a means to bring that devious weasel Vladaym to heel and take the station for your own. It's what any Rogue Trader would have done. But you have proved yourself to be less predictable than that!"

I was almost certain that you would use my difficulties on Footfall as a means to bring that devious weasel Vladaym to heel and take the station for your own. It's what any Rogue Trader would have done. But you have proved yourself to be less predictable than that!"

{n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "I should be thanking you. I was almost certain that you would use my difficulties on Footfall as a means to bring that devious weasel Vladaym to heel and take the station for your own. It's what any Rogue Trader would have done. But you have proved yourself to be less predictable than that!"

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは上機嫌で凶暴な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「お前には感謝しないとな。フットフォールで俺が直面した難局を利用して狡猾にコソコソ動いているヴラダイムがステーションを奪い、お前に差し出すのはほぼ間違いないと思ってたんだ。自由開拓者なら誰でもそうするってな。だが、お前の行動は予測不可能だと証明しやがった！」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "I should be thanking you. I was almost certain that you would use my difficulties on Footfall as a means to bring that devious weasel Vladaym to heel and take the station for your own. It's what any Rogue Trader would have done. But you have proved yourself to be less predictable than that!"

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスは上機嫌で凶暴な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「お前には感謝しないとな。フットフォールで俺が直面した難局を利用して狡猾にコソコソ動いているヴラダイムがステーションを奪い、お前に差し出すのはほぼ間違いないと思ってたんだ。自由開拓者なら誰でもそうするってな。だが、お前の行動は予測不可能だと証明しやがった！」

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯露出了愉悦而野性的笑容。{/n}“是我应该感谢你才对。我本以为你一定会利用我在落脚港的艰难处境，强迫那个狡猾的弗拉迪姆就范，然后将那座贸易站据为己有，这才是行商浪人会做的事情。然而事实证明，你的行事风格真是出人意表！”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "I should be thanking you. I was almost certain that you would use my difficulties on Footfall as a means to bring that devious weasel Vladaym to heel and take the station for your own. It's what any Rogue Trader would have done. But you have proved yourself to be less predictable than that!"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯报以掠食者般的愉快笑容。{/n}“是我应该感谢你才对。我本以为你一定会利用我在落脚港的艰难处境，强迫那个狡猾的弗拉迪姆就范，然后将那座贸易站据为己有，这才是行商浪人会做的事情。然而事实证明，你的行事风格真是出人意表！”

languages.text: {n}Calligos te lanza una mirada alegre y un tanto salvaje.{/n} «Soy yo quien le debería dar las gracias. Estaba prácticamente convencido de que aprovecharía mis dificultades en Paso para hacer entrar en vereda a esa comadreja de Vladaym y apropiarse de la estación. Es lo que hubiera hecho cualquier otro Comerciante Independiente. ¡Pero ha resultado ser mucho menos predecible!».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "I should be thanking you. I was almost certain that you would use my difficulties on Footfall as a means to bring that devious weasel Vladaym to heel and take the station for your own. It's what any Rogue Trader would have done. But you have proved yourself to be less predictable than that!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos te lanza una mirada alegre y depredadora.{/n} «Soy yo quien le debería dar las gracias. Estaba prácticamente convencido de que aprovecharía mis dificultades en Paso para hacer entrar en vereda a esa comadreja de Vladaym y apropiarse de la estación. Es lo que hubiera hecho cualquier otro Comerciante Independiente. ¡Pero ha resultado ser mucho menos predecible!».

languages.text: {n}Calligos vous adresse un sourire aussi joyeux que farouche.{/n} « Je devrais vous remercier. J'étais persuadé que vous profiteriez de mes difficultés à Castel pour museler cette fouine de Vladaym et vous emparer de la station pour votre propre compte. C'est ce qu'aurait fait n'importe quel autre libre-marchand, mais apparemment, vous n'êtes pas aussi prévisible ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "I should be thanking you. I was almost certain that you would use my difficulties on Footfall as a means to bring that devious weasel Vladaym to heel and take the station for your own. It's what any Rogue Trader would have done. But you have proved yourself to be less predictable than that!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos vous adresse un sourire qui, vous ne savez comment, paraît aussi joyeux que carnassier.{/n} « Je devrais vous remercier. J'étais persuadé que vous profiteriez de mes difficultés à Castel pour museler cette fouine de Vladaym et vous emparer de la station pour votre propre compte. C'est ce qu'aurait fait n'importe quel autre libre-marchand, mais apparemment, vous n'êtes pas aussi prévisible ! »

languages.text: {n}Calligos schenkt dir ein gleichermaßen freundliches wie düsteres Lächeln.{/n} "Ich sollte Euch danken. Ich war nahezu sicher, Ihr würdet meine Schwierigkeiten auf Footfall dazu benutzen, dieses hinterlistige Wiesel Vladaym unter Kontrolle zu bringen und die Station zu übernehmen. Alle anderen Freihändler hätten das getan. Aber Ihr habt gezeigt, dass Ihr nicht so berechenbar seid!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "I should be thanking you. I was almost certain that you would use my difficulties on Footfall as a means to bring that devious weasel Vladaym to heel and take the station for your own. It's what any Rogue Trader would have done. But you have proved yourself to be less predictable than that!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos lächelt freundlich und gleichzeitig raubtierhaft.{/n} "Ich sollte Euch danken. Ich war nahezu sicher, Ihr würdet meine Schwierigkeiten auf Footfall dazu benutzen, dieses hinterlistige Wiesel Vladaym unter Kontrolle zu bringen und die Station zu übernehmen. Alle anderen Freihändler hätten das getan. Aber Ihr habt gezeigt, dass Ihr nicht so berechenbar seid!"

languages.text: {n}Calligos; neşeli, biraz da vahşi bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Aslında sana teşekkür etmeliyim. Binliman'daki müşkül durumu, o sinsi Vladaym'ı dize getirip istasyonu ele geçirmek için bir araç olarak kullanacağından neredeyse emindim. Hür Tacir dediğin öyle yapardı ama sen, bundan daha da öngörülemez olduğunu kanıtladın!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "I should be thanking you. I was almost certain that you would use my difficulties on Footfall as a means to bring that devious weasel Vladaym to heel and take the station for your own. It's what any Rogue Trader would have done. But you have proved yourself to be less predictable than that!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos, sana neşeli ve biraz vahşi bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Aslında sana teşekkür etmeliyim. Binliman'daki müşkül durumu, o sinsi Vladaym'ı dize getirip istasyonu ele geçirmek için bir araç olarak kullanacağından neredeyse emindim. Hür Tacir dediğin öyle yapardı ama sen, bundan daha da öngörülemez olduğunu kanıtladın!"
